resources.string: Choose records in a range, and create a visual heatmap to observe the spread of bullet impacts, allowing you to analyze the distribution patterns.
Try to position your phone directly above the target paper to avoid distorted targets.\nTry to capture the targets as large as possible.
The top side of your phone should correspond to the left side of the target paper (in landscape view).If the text is upside-down, rotate the paper.\nFlash light will be used to avoid shadow.
